hotspots.label: Adhesive Toe Pads
hotspots.fact: These special sticky toe pads help the frog climb smooth surfaces like walls and glass! The tiny hairs on each toe pad create a grip that works even on wet surfaces.

hotspots.label: Bumpy Skin Texture
hotspots.fact: The bumpy, warty-looking skin helps the frog blend in with tree bark and rocks. This camouflage helps the frog hide from predators in its natural forest home.

hotspots.label: Large Bulging Eyes
hotspots.fact: A frog's huge eyes help it see in many directions at once to spot insects and danger! Frogs have excellent night vision, which helps them hunt when it's dark.

hotspots.label: Long Hind Legs
hotspots.fact: These powerful back legs allow frogs to jump up to 20 times their own body length! The strong muscles in the hind legs make frogs amazing jumpers and swimmers.
